item.title: Network Centrality
item.description: This is one of notes from CS3943/9223 Foundation of Data Science at New York University. In this article, we talk about how to measure the centrality in networks. What is centrality? In graph theory and network analysis, indicators of centrality identify the most important vertices within a graph. Here is an example network with 5 nodes, and 5 links. There are three ways to measure centrality: 1. Degree centrality 2.
